net.jhoogland.jautomata.io

Class TransducerIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.io.TransducerIO

  • public class TransducerIO
extends Object
    This class contains static methods to read and write (weighted) transducers.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland

      • read

        public static <I,O,K> Transducer<I,O,K> read(Reader reader,
                             Semiring<K> semiring,
                             Format<I> inputLabelFormat,
                             Format<O> outputLabelFormat)
                              throws IOException
        Creates and returns a transducer from the specified reader. The semiring and input and output label formats are specified by the arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        public static <K> Transducer<Character,Character,K> read(Reader reader,
                                         Semiring<K> semiring)
                                              throws IOException
        Creates and returns a transducer from the specified reader. The semiring is specified by the argument. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as input and output label formats.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readUnweighted

        public static <I,O> Transducer<I,O,Boolean> readUnweighted(Reader reader,
                                           Format<I> inputLabelFormat,
                                           Format<O> outputLabelFormat)
                                              throws IOException
        Creates and returns an unweighted transducer from the specified reader. The input and output label formats are specified by the arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readUnweighted

        public static Transducer<Character,Character,Boolean> readUnweighted(Reader reader)
                                                              throws IOException
        Creates and returns an unweighted transducer from the specified reader. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as input and output label formats.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readWeighted

        public static <I,O> Transducer<I,O,Double> readWeighted(Reader reader,
                                        Format<I> inputLabelFormat,
                                        Format<O> outputLabelFormat)
                                           throws IOException
        Creates and returns a weighted transducer over the real semiring from the specified reader. The input and output label formats are specified by the arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readWeighted

        public static Transducer<Character,Character,Double> readWeighted(Reader reader)
                                                           throws IOException
        Creates and returns a weighted transducer over the real semiring from the specified reader. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as input and output label formats.
        Throws:
        IOException
